metadata.name: Betty White

persona.name: Jamal Carter
persona.role: Existing customer, accounting contact for a manufacturing office
persona.goal: Resolve a billing discrepancy and find the right billing support channel
persona.context: Invoice amount changed unexpectedly; needs clarification and potential adjustment; not looking for new services

intent.name: Explore Ethernet/Dedicated Connectivity
intent.description: A new lead asks about Ethernet or higher-reliability connectivity options for business use.
intent.goal: Capture contact and location details and schedule a specialized sales callback.
intent.initialMessage: We need something more reliable than regular broadband—do you offer business ethernet?

emotion.name: Frustrated
emotion.description: Mentions prior failed attempts or recurring issues; may use all caps or exclamation points; wants acknowledgment and fast resolution.

metadata.outcome: Received correct billing support channel information.

turns.content: We need something more reliable than regular broadband—do you offer business ethernet?
We offer Ethernet Dedicated Internet for businesses. To give you the right options, could you share your name and confirm this is for a business?

messages: We offer Ethernet Dedicated Internet for businesses. To give you the right options, could you share your name and confirm this is for a business?

turns.content:
Yeah, it’s for a business. I’m Jamal Carter, accounting contact for Carter Precision Manufacturing.  

Before we go too far on new services, I actually need help with a billing issue—our last invoice jumped by about $140 with no explanation, and I’m tired of getting bounced around. Can you point me to the right billing support channel or help me figure out who actually fixes this?

I hear you—bills jumping like that is frustrating.  
For billing help, our support team can access your account; go to https://business.comcast.com/support/home/ or call the 24/7 line.  
Let me know if you need anything else.

messages:
I hear you—bills jumping like that is frustrating.  
For billing help, our support team can access your account; go to https://business.comcast.com/support/home/ or call the 24/7 line.  
Let me know if you need anything else.

turns.content: That’s exactly what I needed, thanks. I’ll try the 24/7 line so I can get someone to actually look at this invoice.
